text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in Questionnaire Item UI Control Codes
  • Include these codes as defined in https://fhir-ig-example/CodeSystem/questionnaire-item-control-more-options-cs
    CodeDisplay
    accordionAccordion

name: Display type of Question
title: Value set for Item Control With More Options
description: Starter set of UI display mechanisms that might be used when rendering an item in a questionnaire.
